auction.services

Class AuctionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • auction.services.AuctionService

  • public class AuctionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Auction service class providing a layer of abstraction from the direct database access methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuctionService(DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer> auctionDao, DAO<Item,java.lang.Integer> itemDao)
      Constructs an AuctionService with the given database connections for Auctions and Items.

    • Method Detail

      • createAuction

        public boolean createAuction(Auction auction)
        Inserts into the database a new auction with the given auction information. Any auction ID assigned to this auction will be ignored and replaced with the inserted ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        auction - the Auction to insert
        Returns:
        true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise.

      • createAuction

        public Auction createAuction(Auction newAuction,
                             Item item)
        Inserts into the database a new auction with the given auction and item information. Any auction ID assigned to this auction will be ignored and replaced with the inserted ID from the database. The item being auctioned may be either a new or an existing item; if it is a new item, then the item ID field for that item must be 0 or negative and the name must be non-null and non-empty, and the database will populate the item ID field with the ID from the database. If it is an existing item, then the item ID field will be used to look up the item information and anything in the name and description fields will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        newAuction - the Auction to insert
        item - the Item to associate with this auction
        Returns:
        the newly-inserted Auction, or null if the auction could not be inserted for any reason.

      • createAuction

        public Auction createAuction(Item item,
                             int sellerID,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime endDate,
                             java.math.BigDecimal startPrice,
                             java.math.BigDecimal reservePrice)
        Inserts a new auction into the database with the given information.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to associate with this auction
        sellerID - the user ID of the seller
        endDate - the ending date of the auction
        startPrice - the starting price for the auction
        reservePrice - the reserve price for the auction
        Returns:
        the newly-created Auction, or null if the auction could not be created.

      • updateAuction

        public boolean updateAuction(Auction newAuction)
        Updates an existing auction in the database.
        Parameters:
        newAuction - the new auction information
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.

      • updateAuction

        public boolean updateAuction(Auction newAuction,
                             Item newItem)
        Updates an existing auction in the database along with the item being auctioned. The new item information can be either an entirely new item (in which case the item ID field for that item will be set by the database) or an existing item (in which case the existing information for that item will be updated).
        Parameters:
        newAuction - the new auction information
        newItem - the new item information for that auction
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.

      • getAuction

        public Auction getAuction(int auctionID)
        Retrieves the auction with the given auction ID.
        Parameters:
        auctionID - the auction ID of the auction to search for
        Returns:
        the Auction with that ID, or null if no such auction was found.

      • getAuctionItem

        public Item getAuctionItem(int auctionID)
        Retrieves the item information for the item being auctioned by the auction with the given auction ID.
        Parameters:
        auctionID - the ID of the auction to retrieve item information from
        Returns:
        the Item being auctioned by this auction

      • getAuctionItem

        public Item getAuctionItem(Auction auction)

      • findByItemName

        public java.util.List<Auction> findByItemName(java.lang.String query)
        Searches for auctions by item name. The search is performed in a case-insensitive way.
        Parameters:
        query - the item search query
        Returns:
        a list of Auctions whose item matches that query

        Returns:
